packages.name: Ambient Weather Station
packages.description: Integrates your Internet connected Ambient Weather Station system into the Hubitat environment.

packages.name: Hubitat on Apple Menubar
packages.description: Monitor and control Hubitat devices, sensors, Hubitat Safety Monitor and Modes quickly from the Apple Menu Bar.  Requires freeware Xbar 2.17-Beta, Python3 v3.11+, Apple macOS v13+

packages.name: BWA Spa Manager - Cloud Control
packages.description: Integrates your internet connected Hot Tub/Spa system with Balboa Cloud Spa Controller into the Hubitat environment.  Use this app/driver version if your SPA can only connect to the cloud based BWA Spa Control app.

packages.name: BWA Spa Manager - Local TCP Direct Connection Device Driver
packages.description: Integrates your locally connected (Hubitat Hub and SPA must be on the same home network) connected Hot Tub/Spa system (Balboa WiFi controller) into the Hubitat environment.  Use this Hubitat device driver only version to directly TCP connect to the SPA WiFi controller.

packages.name: Dywarmic Towel Warmer Integration
packages.description: Provides local network WiFi integraton to a Dywarmic Towel Warmer.

packages.name: Idioms
packages.description: Provides an Idiom phrase and it's definition (over 20K+) in a virtual device driver for voice TTS output each time refreshed or switched on
